title: FLULAVAL QUADRIVALENT (Influenza Vaccine) | GSK Flu
description: Learn more about FLULAVAL QUADRIVALENT. Access information on dosing & coding, immunogenicity, and more.
cleaned_text: Children aged 3 through 17 years In a clinical trial in subjects aged 3 through 17 years, FLULAVAL QUADRIVALENT (n=878) exhibited immunogenicity noninferior to two comparator trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine (TIV) formulations, each containing an influenza type B virus that corresponded to one of the two B viruses in FLULAVAL QUADRIVALENT, a type B virus of the Victoria lineage (TIV-1, n=871) or a type B virus of the Yamagata lineage (TIV-2, n=878). - Noninferiority was based on adjusted GMTs and seroconversion rates1 - Seroconversion was defined as a 4-fold increase over baseline in hemagglutination inhibition (HI) antibody from
